A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A disappointing tryst into poor storytelling\, with better advertisements than the actual thing. 
Tip:
If you liked the Force Awakens: You wont like The Last Jedi
If you liked Rogue One: You wont like The Last Jedi.
If you like cohesive storytelling\, and basic logic: You won't like The Last Jedi.
If you want to take a break from your anxieties\, to watch a feel good movie by Disney\, which is sure to at the very least be minutely entertaining; You won't like the Last Jedi
Just go watch Thor Ragnarok\, at least it is funny.
*However\,
If you want an in depth understanding on the Social Dynamics\, feelings\, life cycle\, breeding habits\, habitat\, sleeping habits among other informations\, on the fictional\, wide eyed\, "Porg"\, then by all means\, Disregard the above ramblings\, and enjoy the film
